title: Trump’s Plan to Destroy the Democrat’s Impeachment Hoax (Ep 1452)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the new details of the Trump plan to decimate the Democrat’s impeachment hoax. 

News Picks:


The hoax impeachment trial will begin this week. Trump’s defense team plans on showing clips of Democrat’s calling for violence.


Liz Cheney doubles down on failure.


The media in this country are a complete disgrace and a total embarrassment. They‘ve become the speech police. 


More on the secret cabal that manipulated the 2020 election. 


Tucker Carlson absolutely wrecks Shepard Smith.

GOP congressmen introduce bill inspired by Ilhan Omar’s suspect campaign payments.
